page.title: 03My Family
page.content: In my family l've got a sister named Jo-anne.She likes to go to Brownies. Also she likes to ride her bike,and play tennis.Also in my family l have a Dad named Alan.He works at G.E.C.It's an electrical works.They make light bulbs,televisions etc.His hobbies are riding his bike,going on picnics and jogging.Also in my family l have got my Mum named Barbara.She works round Balsall Common as a Home Help.That job is where she has to look after old people.She can't drive yet so she goes to work on her bike.Her hobbies are bike riding and cooking,not shopping. She is trying to learn to drive.My name is Estelle. l go to Lady Katherine School and so does my sister.I enjoy playing darts and snooker,and I enjoy riding my bike and playing tennis.
